title: Product Hunt Scraper - Production Ready
description: Fast, reliable Product Hunt scraper. Extract product names, descriptions, images from any category with automatic pagination.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Custom Product Hunt URL to start scraping from (optional). If provided, this overrides the category setting.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Products
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of products to scrape (1-100)

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape (1-10). Each page contains ~15 products.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Optional proxy settings for enhanced reliability
